shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dawit “Psalter” (fols. 4r-175vb) I-1) Mäzmurä Dawit “Psalms of David” (fols. 4r-142v) I-2) Mäḫalǝyä näbiyat “The Canticles of the Prophets” (fols. 142v-156v) I-3) Mäḫalǝyä mäḫalǝy “Song of Songs” (fols. 157r-164r) I-4) Wǝddase Maryam “Praise of Mary” (fols. 164va-174va) I-5) ʾAnqäṣä bǝrhan “The Gate of Light” (fols. 174va-175vb), incomplete
Additio 1.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is incomplete. The front board is broken; the back board is missing. Some fols. are missing. Many fols. are worn are stained with wax and dirt. The outer edge of many fols. is damaged by rodents (with the loss of text, fols. 170-180).

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (the front board is broken; the back board is missing) covered with reddish-brown tooled leather (mostly missing; only traces of the turn-ins remained on inner side of the front board). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown tooled leather (at least 1 tool was used: triple line fillet).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine fols of the quires, close to the head and tail of the codex.

squires.squire: A(3; s.l.: 2, stub after 2/fols. 1r-3v) – I(10/fols. 4r-13v) – II(10/fols. 14r-23v) – III(10/fols. 24r-33v) – IV(10/fols. 34r-43v) – V(10/fols. 44r-53v) – VI(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 54r-61v) – VII(8/fols. 62r-69v) – VIII(8/fols. 70r-77v) – IX(10/fols. 78r-87v) – X(8/fols. 88r-95v) – XI(10/fols. 96r-105v) – XII(10/fols. 106r-115v) – XIII(10; s.l.: 4, stub after 7; 6, stub after 4/fols. 116r-125v) – XIV(10/fols. 126r-135v) – XV(10/fols. 136r-145v) – XVI(10/fols. 146r-155v) – XVII(10/fols. 156r-165v) – XVIII(10/fols. 166r-175v).

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: all data are for fol. 16r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/J. Primary pricks are not visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible (s. fol. 122r). The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-4, I-5: all data are for fol. 165r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

abbreviations.abbreviation: እስ᎓ for እስመ᎓ ለዓለም᎓ ምሕረቱ᎓ (Ps. 135, fols. 130v-131r) ስ᎓ for ስቡሕኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ወልዑልኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ለዓለም᎓ (Canticle 10, fols. 152r-153r) ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት፡ “Pray for us, the Holy One!“ is variously abbreviated as ሰ፡ (e. g., fol. 173vb), ሰ፡ ቅ፡ (e. g., fol. 173vb), also as ሰ፡ አ፡ (e. g., fol. 174ra). In Text I-4, refrains for each daily portion are usually abbreviated and rubricated (s. fols. 164r, 165v, etc.).

otherdetails.otherdetail: Traditional interpretation of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 is missing.

additional.cont: Fols. 1v-2r: Hymn in praise of the Virgin Mary (incomplete?).
additional.det: Incomplete; crudely written. The prayer is difficult to read, since esp. fols. 1-2 are worn and damaged, with text partly abraided.

extras.extra: - The name of the work, መዝሙረ፡ ዳዊት፡, is written on a piece of white paper glued onto the front cover. - The Pss. are divided into groups of ten separated by a line of alternating black and red dots. - Part of the line is taken up: e.g., fols. 5v, 8v, 10v, 12r, 14r, 35r, 47v, 68r, 108v, 112v, 147v, 160r. - Part of the line is taken down: fols. 25r, 25v, 69r, 119v, 124r, 146r. - Omitted words and passages are written interlineally, in a secondary hand: fols. 47v, 48r, 62r, 71v, 74v, 75r, 84v, 93r, 96r, 130v. - Crude notes, scribbles: fols. 3r, 3v, 14r, 14v, 15r, 159v, 160r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Red threads inserted into outer margin of fols. 29, 50, 95, 110, 135, 142.

frames.frame: Fol. 4r (incipit of Text I-1): elaborate coloured (red, black) ornamental band; interlaces, geometric motifs.
